attributes.action: Allow Free Public Transport to Get to collage or sixthform On a school day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To link witht th ema i have to pay £3.25 for a return to travel 2.9 miles. If the goverment could do anything i would be mostly gratful as I get a full £30 a week and that dose not cover my lunch or bus travel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
